title: Syberia 3: Digital Deluxe Edition – v3.0 + DLC
body:
Syberia 3: Digital Deluxe Edition – v3.0 + DLC


Genres/Tags: Adventure, Point-and-click, Side, 3D
Companies: Microids, Koalabs, Anuman Interactive
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 21.3 GB
Repack Size: from 13.6 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only] (All VO)
  • RuTor [magnet] (RU/EN VO)
  • FreeTorrents (RU/EN VO)
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] (RU/EN VO)
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2] (All VO)
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, NOT compatible with other mirrors) (All VO)
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors) (All VO)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc [Single Direct Link] (Upto 100MB/s, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Syberia.3.An.Automaton.with.a.plan-RELOADED ISO release: rld-syberia3aawap.iso (22,604,152,832 bytes)
  • Missing Digital Deluxe Edition bonus content added (220 MB)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus content (OST, ArtBook, Comic Book, Wallpaper) and speech files you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 21.3 to 13.6~14.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~20 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~30 minutes on 4-cores CPU; ~40 minutes on 2-cores CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 38 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The limitless imagination of Benoit Sokal continues in Syberia 3, focusing on an entirely new adventure. After abandoning the island, Kate is found dying on the edge of a river by the Youkole tribe, a nomadic people migrating with their snow ostriches. Stuck in Valsembor village, together they must find a way to continue their journey in a race against their enemies and unexpected obstacles, not to mention Kate’s past, which catches up with her.

The next generation in adventure games, Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters, you’ll discover and experience a fabulous tale as imagined by Benoit Sokal.

An Automaton with a Plan DLC

Discover “An Automaton with a Plan”, a new adventure that takes place in the enchanted world of Syberia 3! Play as Oscar, the famous automat, and unravel the mystery of Kate Walker’s disappearance!

Oscar is far more than just a metal heart… He’s also a sharp-witted detective and unwitting comedian who will surprise you at every turn!

Enjoy a story full of suspense and humor in the world of Syberia 3, created and drawn by Benoit Sokal.

Game Features

  • A brand new tale, completely different from the first two Syberia games
  • Exceptionally immersive storytelling, multiplied by Benoit Sokal’s unparalleled artistic direction
  • Explore Benoit Sokal’s poetic universe in 3D for the first time
  • Original score by Inon Zur (Syberia 2, Fallout, Dragon Age, Prince of Persia)
  • Original, real-time 3D puzzles and mysteries

Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

  • Game Copy
  • Digital Soundtracks (*mp3)
  • Exclusive Digital 20 first pages of the next Comic Books (*Pdf)
  • 1 Digital Wallpaper

This repack IS NOT BACKWARDS COMPATIBLE with my previous repacks of Syberia 3.
